property.description: the mode to merge ram index:concurrent or serial

property.name: indexing.ramdirqueuesize
property.description: max amount of ram dir to be merge

property.name: indexing.docmakerthreadcount
property.description: max amount of doc makder thread

property.description: 内存索引大小达到该数值，则放到merge队列中，等待合并
